description:
Saves a machine learning model as part of a batch job.

The model will be accompanied by a separate STAC Item that implements the [mlm-model extension](https://github.com/crim-ca/mlm-extension).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to store as a machine learning model.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional parameters to create the file(s).

returns.description: Returns `false` if the process failed to store the model, `true` otherwise.
